lenders.name: Just Falcons
lenders.loan_because: We're a social justice group in a Catholic High School in the Algonquin Lakeshore Catholic District School Board.  Microcredit is a way to exercise the "preferential option"for helping those who want to help themselves.  Yay!
lenders.occupational_info: Our group organizes events to raise awareness about issues of social injustice in the world in the light of the good news of the gospel.   Our school participates in Habitat for Humanity builds (we went to Harrisburg, Penn. this year) , Earth Day Trash Bash, Microcredit Summit in Halifax 2007, Thinkfast 24 fast to raise funds for Canadian Catholic Organization for Development and Peace, and a Dominican Rep. Exposure Tour every year. We've rasied funds for water purification biofilters for bateys we visit every year in the Dr. We even built our own house in Trenton with Habitat for Humanity.  We also sleep outside in cardboard boxes in the winter to raise funds for Habitat and to try to identify with the Homeless. We participate in Street Retreats in Toronto twice a year to learn about the causes of poverty in Canada.

lenders.name: Patricia and Chuck
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate here in the U.S. and take even the smallest things for granted.  I want to share our blessings with others around the world so that they have the chance to be successful at whatever is important to them.
lenders.occupational_info: own a day spa where we help people who have chronic pain or health issues, as well as relaxing and stress relieving massage and spa therapies.

lenders.name: Scarlett
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help individuals who have a dream of making a brighter future for themselves and their families.  I made my first loan when I sold back a textbook and received $50, an unexpected amount.  

I can so easily go about my daily life without thinking about individuals in the developing world who do not always have access to things like education and healthcare that I take for granted.  Loaning is a way for me to feel connected to people who are thriving despite poverty.  

We have a commitment to each other as humans to look out for the well being of others, regardless of any social constructs such as nationality or race.

I believe in Kiva's vision.  I hope to join the Peace Corps with my husband in two years so that I can do more to make this world a better place.  My contribution may be small, but if we all do a little, then a difference can be made.

lenders.name: Solomon Broad
lenders.loan_because:
Please *do not* contact me via Kiva.



The money that I waste on frivolities like a Starbucks coffee or a chocolate bar can make a life-changing difference to these people. It's nothing to me, but it's an awful lot to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a shop, selling building materials. Very humdrum.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It's each of our responsibility to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for our public schools, letting the community know the great things we do to educate children.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lenders.occupational_info: I find ways of using computers to make my company more efficient

lenders.loan_because: a person to person loan means I can have a sense i know where my money is going and who I am helping.

lenders.name: The Chandler Foundation
lenders.loan_because: "The survival of the world depends upon our sharing what we have and working together.   Fools Crow.     Ceremonial Chief of the Teton Sioux"
lenders.occupational_info: A  Metis Family. Haudenosaune, (Mohawk), Montagnais (First Nation)and French Canadian trying to bring change to our brothers and sisters on the Lakota Sioux Reservation at Pine Ridge, South Dakota (http://nativeprogress.org)and to third world entrepreneur's, via KIVA. We are all remotely related and it's time to even the score among all the peoples of the world! If we do not come together as one, we will surely perish! The small changes that we are able to bring about, will be remembered by generations, of the people we have helped!

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: It's cool, and Kiva rocks.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a social media/website/communications maven and storyteller.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: Reaching out and helping is part of why we are here.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large university library in the United States.

lenders.name: Courtland
lenders.loan_because: With the state of the world being what it is, I want to do whatever I can to help improve the lives of those who want to work to build a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a regional manager for a compliance firm.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world, however small my part may be.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on software. It is sometimes very challenging but rewarding too, and it funds my trips to go diving!  I teach scuba as well to share this awesome world with others.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping someone to help themselves.  If a small loan from me can sustain a family I am getting more than I am giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I build affordable homes for those who need a place to live and have modest resouces.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.occupational_info: Chips. Computer chips.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people manage their money.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in an office and try to look serious.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: This is so much better than blindly donating money.

lenders.name: Sumit
lenders.loan_because: I want to lend a hand in raising the standard of living of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies plan their activities so that they manufacture goods efficiently.

lenders.name: Andy and Serenity
lenders.occupation: Follow Jesus, Love People, Be Simple
lenders.loan_because: We love Jesus, and believe in God's Economy.  The money we have is on loan from Him.  Matthew 25:40.
lenders.occupational_info: We travel the United States and Canada and love people, sharing what we have been given to the poor and marginalized we meet.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Helping those that wish to help themselves is a priveledge.
lenders.occupational_info: I train competitive boxers and military special forces.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: If you believe in the capitalist  system, you should practice it.
lenders.occupational_info: Now partially retired, but managed and invested in airline, aviation ground support and publishing companies.

lenders.name: Russ & Elaine
lenders.loan_because: we all need a hand now and again.

lenders.name: toffer
lenders.loan_because: Because I can live without my money longer than most of these people can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I research hormone behavior relations in mammals.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is hard for women to get business loans and want to give them an equal opportunity - or at least a start.

lenders.name: Mona & Randy Simoneaux
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy it.
lenders.occupational_info: IT Analyst & Administrative Assistant

lenders.name: Anthony Obeyesekere
lenders.loan_because: Changing the world, one step at a time. :)
lenders.occupational_info: I work on economic analysis and forecasting.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.occupational_info: Ecosystem Restoration

lenders.name: pat
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help others all over the world with their business ventures since I also have a small business too! Peace and best wishes to all!

lenders.name: suki
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world.

lenders.name: matslats
lenders.loan_because: I believe in human rights, I have spare money, and want to use it better than a commercial bank.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites for non-profit organisations

lenders.name: Adi S
lenders.loan_because: I just a student on college and work part time on internet cafe
lenders.occupational_info: I'am a operator internet cafe in Jogjakarta - Indonesia.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: As a true Christian, it is imperative to help all people. Christ has blessed my family more than I could ever imagine. Hopefully these loans will bless others.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I can..I would not be were I am, or have what I have, if not for being able to borrow.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Major social and economic change only happens at the individual - personal level.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage design and sales for a sign company.

lenders.name: Wilbur
lenders.loan_because: To help others where possible
lenders.occupational_info: I work on oracle database for a large retailer from Minnesota, USA.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to pass forward the gratitude I have for all that I've been given and at times, I've taken for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with urban communities to realize their visions for the rivers, trails, and open spaces closest to where they live, work, & play.  Together, we create partnerships to leverage the resources required to restore, create, & conserve the public places they value most.

lenders.name: Cassondra
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great opportunity for those of us with limited means, or without huge sums of free cash, to make a real difference in the world. I've always felt a little helpless in the face of some of the world's problems. "What, " I have asked, "Can one person really do?" And suddenly, I've found my answer.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my job because not only do I love books, but because, essentially, I love helping people. I do all sorts of different kinds of helping -- from helping someone find a good book to read, to helping someone find materials to learn English, to helping people find out how to fill out job applications and resumes. I especially love introducing children to the infinite world of books and reading.

lenders.name: Brian de San Pablo de Leon Cortes
Josie
lenders.loan_because: I'm involved with kiva because I can't imagine the impossibilities of  'making it'  without credit institutions.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It seems like the right thing to do.

lenders.name: LilithsCircle
lenders.loan_because: We want to engage with the global community by promoting individual businesses which are improving the quality of life for those involved.
lenders.occupational_info: You will find us everywhere doing almost anything that requires creativity, compassion and bravery.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: As the daughter of immigrants, I know the challenges of flourishing financially, and how much a little loan can go a long way.  I don't make much money, however I make enough to get by -  therefore it is my duty to give when I can.  I think everyone just needs a little support sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from college, my major was acting.  I also write plays and short stories. I recently moved to New York where I waitress/bartend by day and act in plays by night.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better their life, and if I can help, I will.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: The difference between me and others is often based on where we were born, not on capabilities.  It seems logical to share and allow others opportunities I came by easily.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies make sure the work the do can be done without hurting their workers, hurting the environment or making products that could hurt the customers

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I saw Kiva featured on a PBS program and want to help.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Helping others become empowered is a great feeling! We all need a leg up.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to teach in an interactive, creative way. I incorporate music, art  and drama into teaching writing. I also hope to inspire kids to love reading.

lenders.name: The Tais
lenders.loan_because: We all have been blessed with abundance in the States and God calls us to share with those who have less.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: This is a perfect way to directly make a difference to hardworking, smart people who just need a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my clients market their businesses to other businesses who need their products or services.

lenders.name: Alesia
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a small sign business in Dallastown, Pennsylvania.

lenders.name: Raimundo
lenders.loan_because: I believe the only way the world will get better is if each individual does their part in helping others.  I have been blessed and I want to pass these blessings on to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair machining and processing equipment at a production facility.  We machine engine blocks and heads for a large international company.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: We are all members of the family of man.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children to read and write.

lenders.name: Jeff and Theresa
lenders.loan_because: we believe in the mandate that to whom much is given, much is required.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeff is a postdoc studying HIV. Theresa edits journals and books and works as a freelance writer.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I'm an idealist and a pragmatist. Kiva serves both those interests.

lenders.name: Karl and Janis
lenders.loan_because: We have been given so much and we want to give back - the stories are wonderful - so uplifting

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I am

lenders.name: David Gonzalez
lenders.loan_because:
El pobre carece de muchas cosas, pero el avaro carece de todo.
(Séneca)

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.occupational_info: college professor teaching courses on nuclear issues

lenders.name: scenario
lenders.occupational_info: Living out the purpose I was created for

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: Because this is a great idea, it keeps on giving!!!

lenders.name: Claire Elise D.
lenders.loan_because: A woman I do business with had a baby and I thought instead of a gift, lets invest the money in the name of Claire Elise.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: It's an honor.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: it's the most effective way of getting funds directly to people in need and it's gratifying watching them make the investment grow
lenders.occupational_info: public health researcher

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: As a park ranger, my job was to protect the park's natural and cultural resources, this includes law enforcement duties, and to educate the public about these resources.

lenders.name: Ivan Barriga
lenders.loan_because: "each of us can work to change a small portion of events, and in the total of all those acts will be written the history of this generation" ~ Robert Kennedy

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to see that my donation will have a real affect.
lenders.occupational_info:
Sales and maintenance of industrial supplies.
Expedited delivery of time critical products.

lenders.name: KAREN
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance!!
lenders.occupational_info: I do a lot of volunteer work through an NGO and I take part in internationall youth seminars. That's untill I go for a Masters program in Criminology :D

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: My good friend Jen has taught me to look beyond the area that I live in and open my eyes to the needs of people around the world.  I lead a good life, and I want to share that with people who just need a helping hand.  What Jen has told me and made me aware of has made me realize that even doing something little can make a big difference.  She will change the world one of these days, and I hope that little things like this will help her in her future endevours of making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Lucious
lenders.loan_because:
l want to start a transport business. it's capital cost is $12,000.00.
l'll repay the loan in 3yrs time. $720 monthly.
lenders.occupational_info: business is the way of life in most third world countries

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I consider myself so fortunate, I'd like to help someone else, even a little bit, as others have helped me.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.occupation: Grad Student/ Citizen of the World

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: Poverty alleviation is one of the most pressing issues facing our global society in the 21st century.  Micro-finance presents an innovative solution that empowers low income entrepreneurs throughout the developing world to improve their lives through self-sufficiency.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I care. I can. I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help enable analysis of information to make better business decisions.

lenders.name: de la Chevrotiere family
lenders.loan_because: I know it's difficult to survive in this world and with a little love and more spontaneous acts of kindness, we can change the world one person at a time.  God bless KIVA

lenders.name: Guillaume
lenders.loan_because: I hope my little contribution will help people set up their business and have a better life

lenders.loan_because: My organization is working for the development of women in Pakistan
lenders.occupational_info: We work for the women our objective is to develope life style of the women in remote areas providing them aducation and training them for small business and also providing them law assistance as per rquirement

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I can and that in and of itself is so awesome.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at building self esteem and confidence with those who seek my help.  I love working with people and am blessed everytime someone comes in and sits in my chair.

lenders.loan_because: A small amount for me can go a long way for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I have led student service trips to Cambodia and Laos. I love both countries.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make at least a small difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix things that break, primarily computers.

lenders.name: Melody

lenders.name: AtTheWatersEdge.Org
lenders.loan_because: we are blessed with resources.
lenders.occupational_info: hands and feet-people of action.

lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: We help raise funds for building projects that serve orphans.

lenders.name: Strobist
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity cost (interest) of being without the money for a time is insignificant compared to the good it can do.
lenders.occupational_info: On the web, I teach photographers how to make better photos by learning how to totally control light from small flashes.

lenders.name: Marc LaFountain
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help others and it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I do public relations work for a state government agency that encourages people and businesses to prepare for emergencies. Our agency also coordinates the state's response and recovery efforts during emergencies.

lenders.name: Pascal
lenders.loan_because: its free, also, why not lend money for a great project?

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to be helpful
lenders.occupational_info: I study accounting and business. I admire people who work hard with their own businesses.

lenders.name: JJ5000
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Because many people in developing countries do not have access to the capital needed to improve their lives.  Micro-loans are a proven success.  Plus, my daughter (age 12)  made me do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an architect for the City of New York.

lenders.name: Sylvie
lenders.loan_because: I think that everyone must live in a good way as long as one works. We live in "rich" lands and we need to help people with economic difficulties.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a law student who wants to use a legal education to make a difference in this world.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: To try to help someone make their small world a better place, which will in turn help the larger world become a better place.
lenders.occupational_info:
I develop technologies for medical devices that aid in the treatment and prevention of illness.
Also, in my spare time, I work to improve on current or develop new technologies for renewable energy.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I am a buddhist and I believe that everyone is equal because we all want happinness and don't want suffering.  I would like to help the poor not suffer as much even if it makes a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in grade 6 French emmersion elementary school.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: we all need a helping hand at some point in our lives.

lenders.name: Karen and Rick
lenders.loan_because: my husband and I are thankful for our large family and would like to share what we have with other families.
lenders.occupational_info: my husband is a hospice nurse caring for small children and I work for a financial institution

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my small part in the world. I've been fortunate to grow up and experience wonderful opportunities in the US that most likely would not have been possible if my family stayed in Cambodia.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping indigents here in the US and abroad.

lenders.name: bruce
lenders.loan_because: I think micro loans are the way to really help millions of people in a practical, direct way
lenders.occupational_info: I make documentaries for television

lenders.name: Kate and Kieron
lenders.loan_because: We love to help people help themselves. This beats a charity donation, when our loans are repaid we can use that money to loan to somebody else. It allows you to help multiple people with the same cash.
lenders.occupational_info: Kate teaches 6th grade (11 year old) and Kieron implements software for Cummins Power Generation.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I feel strongly that Kiva is a just, fair way of dealing with money.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses get organsed.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and therefore, should.
lenders.occupational_info: Financially rewarding... but not much for social betterment!

lenders.name: Mitch
lenders.loan_because: I know it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create the physical framework for my society such as roads and places to build homes or businesses.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: government programs do not reach the people who have a need for money for their small businesses and I live in Mexico and see the need every day.
lenders.occupational_info: Developing training in legal issues like harassment and discrimination.

lenders.name: Yong
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to our family, and we wanted to share some of those blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in making their lives and communities healthier and stronger.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Information Technology sector (computers).

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are working hard to help themselves.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Perhaps I am able to help in a small way to  ease the hardship, and make someone's  life a little better.
lenders.occupational_info: I love art, and like to be surrounded by beautiful paintings.  My work is to help collectors acquire works of art that give them pleasure and add joy and beauty to their lives.

lenders.name: Bethanne
lenders.loan_because: I was given a wonderful gift certificate for my 50th birthday from a dear friend.  I can't wait to help somebody achieve their dream when I use the gift I was given.
lenders.occupational_info: The non profit organization I work for serves individuals who have Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities through social and leisure programs, educational and legislative advocacy.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I believe I have been very fortunate and others have not.
lenders.occupational_info: People come to talk to me when they are having problems with managing their emotions or their behaviors.

lenders.name: Khouria Jen
lenders.loan_because: I feel like God has blessed me with so much in my life and as a way of being a good steward of what I've been given, I should give back to those who may need a little more to get out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that deals with U.S. Customs brokering for freight entering the US from Canada.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of continuing to reloan the same money.  it also empowers people by having them repay instead of grants that they do not have to pay back. It teaches the basic principal of "hard work pays off and makes one feel terrific."
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recently retired Special Education Teacher.

lenders.name: Eliza & Eva
lenders.loan_because: We have so many blessings in our lives and would like to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: Eliza runs an NGO focused on ending bullying and harassment in K-12 schools in the United States. Eva is an independent film producer.

lenders.name: Reg Keyworth
lenders.loan_because: Its a really great feeling to help others in need out...and very cool indeed to support the entrepreneur spirit these good people have.
lenders.occupational_info:
Freelance professional guitarist.
Writer/Producer.
www.guitarlessons1-0-1.com
www.PlatinumMusicCreations.com
www.sonicbids.com/regkeyworthband
www.facebook.com/elregio.keyworth

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: It's one of the few ways I can help global poverty while I'm still in school.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: When i have more than enough, I feel an obligation to help others make a better life for themselves. I am fortunate to be able to share what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a prison, and it is by turns rewarding, fun, frustrating, and scary. My path through life was not so different that those of my students; it is largely by grace and hard work that I am able to put on my coat and leave each night.

lenders.name: Jarred
lenders.loan_because: Proverbs 31:8-9
lenders.occupational_info: I wish I could give more.

lenders.name: Steve & Nancy
lenders.loan_because: The World Bank does not lend money to people who want to start a business, work hard and make it on their own.  I will.
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own business.  I work on peoples houses that need improvement, repairs or maintenance.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: Even in a land of plenty I know firsthand how hard it can be to get a small business started. I respect the courage and struggle of anyone trying to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a small business that designs and installs audio, video and computer products in the residential market

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Mark & Mindy
lenders.occupational_info: We own a two restaurants in Chicago and hope to open more.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: The idea that my small gift can really make a difference is exciting! It surely will outlast any material item I can think of.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am the afternoon manager of a  small inn (or Bed and Breakfast), along with active involvement in several non profit organizations. lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: This feels like a way to make a real difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Andy & Andrea
lenders.loan_because: my wife and I loan because we feel responsible to give other people a chance to help themselves.  This helps make the world a little bit smaller, which is a good thing.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: This is a way I can help people all over the globe achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lenders.loan_because: its good to give back.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: With a small amount of money people's lives are changed

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I want to keep finding ways to put my personal assets to work for local economic development.
lenders.occupational_info: As a managing director with Gladstone Capital (www.gladstonecapital.com) I invest in companies with sales under $100MM on the strength of their cash flow.  My investments are typically low amortizing loans which are junior to a bank or commercial lender and allow companies to grow into new markets, add capacity or enable the management to have an ownership interest in their businesses.

lenders.name: JoEllen
lenders.loan_because: every person deserves a chance to succeed

lenders.name: Marian
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to have the opportunity to help women who are trying to improve their lives and their children's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer the telephone for the computer dept of a company.  People who work for the company call us to help them with their computer problems, and I direct them to the correct person.

lenders.name: Jen76
lenders.loan_because: It helps to make the world a community we all share in. People need each other, and if there is something I can do to help someone improve their education or life, I want to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother. That's a pretty universal job, so no description is needed!

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.occupational_info: I help adults with mental retardation take care of themselves and their homes.

lenders.name: Jimmy A.
lenders.loan_because: One must be the change he wishes to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate Justice

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: If people are willing to borrow a little to make their lives better, I'm willing to loan a little.

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.loan_because: it is my duty as a human being to help others in need, if I have the ability to do so.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I have much more than I need and this is one small way I choose to share my resources with others.

lenders.name: Vikki
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people. I turned 57 on May 19, 2007. I thought this would be a perfect way to celebrate.
lenders.occupational_info: The real estate company that employs me participates in a number of websites. It is my job to maintain the content on the websites. I am the executive assistant to the company's owner as well and do a variety of tasks for her and for our agents.

lenders.name: Paco
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to assist people that are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the best friend to a crabby, hardworking old man.

lenders.name: SALT
lenders.loan_because: We are in solidarity with people who need a hand up as a matter of justice.
lenders.occupational_info: We represent two Catholic Parishes whose members contribute to Social Justice projects like this.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I like the process of many people joining together to help others! I only wish I had more money to give to this worthy endeavor!

lenders.name: Eugene Action Party
lenders.loan_because: We started our group as a class project in our AP Comparative Politics class. As we learned more about the countries we were studying we felt that by fund-raising money and starting a Kiva account we could actually do something to help.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe

lenders.name: David and Beth
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference in someone's life who needs a chance and money to make life a little better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in risk operations at a corporation, analyzing fraud trends.

lenders.name: Moody
lenders.loan_because: there is need
lenders.occupational_info: making things better where possible within the constraints of form.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others directly to make life better for their families and communities.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, and it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a game inventor, historian and writer.

lenders.name: Arash

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people do things better. I try to use technology to do this.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: To give others a opportunity to enrich their lives, who inturn will then help others along the way.
lenders.occupational_info: Creative, Rewarding and every day is a different challenge.

lenders.name: Eve
lenders.loan_because: I am learning how to share.

lenders.name: Suhail
lenders.loan_because: .... I can make a difference !
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse and work in ICU setting.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I'm in High School in New York. I like History a lot, also English. I am also a lifeguard over the summer, it is not very interesting "work."

lenders.name: MARK
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves, help them improve their lives through their own hard work by giving them a start.
lenders.occupational_info: I review, monitor and manage a varied portfolio of investments in various businesses and industries

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and like to help others!

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because:
I discovered 'Kiva' in Share International Magazine ( www.share-international.org./ )   I think the
concept of Kiva is brilliant.  Giving small scale borrowers a chance to borrow at reasonable rates, and giving ordinary people who can lend, the opportunity to to find a borrower themselves, forges links between humans.  That's got to be good for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a literacy tuition specialist, who works one to one with children of all ages, who need specific help in one or more of the component areas of language learning.

lenders.name: Posy
lenders.loan_because: My first Kiva loan was funded by a Mother's Day gift certificate from my thoughtful daughter!  It's a wonderful way to help mothers all around the world help their families.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's a pleasure to be able to help people in a such a respectful way.

lenders.name: BLam
lenders.loan_because: I would hope to be treated the same way.

lenders.name: Australian friends
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people gain better lives.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's mission is one of the most amazing things that I have heard of in a long time.  To be able to help someone change their own life is a gift, and one that I'm excited to take part in.

lenders.name: Miss Figgins
lenders.loan_because: "I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but my chief duty is to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble." Helen Keller
lenders.occupational_info: I help design web sites and computer training guides so that they are simple for people to understand and use.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to try and help those who are helping themselves.  Especially those who are trying to create businesses that will empower them to provide jobs for others along with support them and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software engineer who develops  for enterprise level data storage devices.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I think micro lending may have a much greater potential to make a large impact on the eradication of poverty than government programs and charity ever have.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses manage money and finance their operations.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and I can.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.occupation: New college graduate and RN mom

lenders.name: rob & emily
lenders.loan_because: As long as we have more than we need, we believe it is important to help those who have less than they need.

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given the chance to fulfill their dreams.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: a little less on my side is much more on the other side

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: nothing is more important than life and nothing is more personal than business.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am part of a Los Angeles-based creative team founded by a group of young adults and inspired by the youths of today. Specializing in high-impact promotions and marketing, brand creation, and identity development for a wide-ranging and influential group of businesses and private clients. 

Our multi-disciplinary team consists of tomorrow's tastemakers and today's trendsetters with creative intentions. We are united by shared independent passions: modernity, film, technology, art, nightlife, music, and fashion
